extendedInfo.description: Have your ex cheated or backstabbed you and you want to take revenge for that?? Then try this entertaining Android Market application and that too for FREE!!Whack your Ex- Girlfriend or Boyfriend is a cool application which includes a boy/girl moving at random positions. Player can hit them simply by swiping their finger in the same direction in which the boy/girl is moving through many objects like stone, cold drink cane, egg etc . Love is an anxiety to be felt around. But the end of a marriage or love is a common loss and may bring pain, anger, humiliation, abandonment and grief.  Now you can take revenge for all your sufferings in a fun and very entertaining way.Until now you have seen many revenge business products like divorce chocolates, teddy, cakes, cards, quotes etc., but whack your ex is a fresh and new themed revenge app with beautiful graphics. If you are furious and frustrated after being cheated by your ex- wife, ex-husband, ex-boyfriend or ex-girlfriend and have tried all the ways of healing like have burned your love letters, deleted your romantic and love messages, thrown your valentine gifts, red roses which you kept safely in your book etc. Try something new at this Christmas, New Year or Valentine by sharing this app with them with an angry note written card.Features:-  Innovative, Strategic and reflexive app-  Quality music and HD graphics.-  3 beautiful themes to choose from: blue pool, green garden and white winter snowy mountains.-  App includes entertaining sound for added realism!-  Easy to use UI, with a help screen (How to play)!-  Can be used over and over for hours of endless fun!     It will definitely lighten your mood and cheer you up!!It will be great if you can share the theme on your facebook wall, twitter, googleplus, gmail and Pinterest as it will make your Social Networking profile page more lively and full of fun and joy.Motivate us by rating & adding your precious comment in the reviews section or by doing g+ if you like it!!Also, no Internet or wifi connection is required for this application. The application has been tested extensively on various models of Samsung galaxy ace, Sony Xperia, HTC One V. It is designed for these resolutions: 240*320, 320*480, 480*854, 480*800, 1024*600,1280*800.
